Nazar Nordic | Nordic Service Guide or Combi Guide summer 2026
Side, Turkey
Rhodes, Greece; Paralímni, Cyprus
Service Guide 

As service guide you are the guests main contact thorughout their stay. Your tasks include:

Welcoming and assisting guests at arrival and departure at the airport
Providing service at hotels and via digital channels (SMS, chat & phone)
Handling questions, situations, and problem solving
Collaboration with hotel partners to ensure a smooth and memorable stay
Working a varied schedule, including day, evening, night and weekend shifts

This position is for someone flexible, solution-orientated, and thrives when no two days are the same. 

Combi Guide - Turkey

The Combi Guide in Turkey combines service and activity responsibilities. Your tasks includes:

Providing personal service at one of our largets family hotels
Handling digital service and problem solving  
Leading kids club actiuvities for children in age 4-11 
Planning and running fun programs, games, and mini disco performances on stage 
Coordinating activities in collaboration with the hotel
Using creativity to make holiday dreams come true for children and families  
Flexible schedule, including day, evening, and weekend shifts

Combi Guide - Rhodes

The Combi Guide in Rhodes also combines service and activity responsibilities:

Service duties across the island:

Assisting guests in airport during arrivals and departures
Providing service and support at all our hotels in Rhodes
Handling digital service and problem solving

Kids club duties in one of our family hotels:

Leading activities for children 4-11 years old
Planning fun program, games, and mini disco performances at stage 
Creating a safe, fun and energetic environment

This position as well includes flexible schedule, including day, evening, night and weekend shifts

Who we are looking for

We seek individuals who:

Have a positive attitude and a genuine interest in people and service.
Enjoy working internationally and taking responsibility. 
Are flexible and solution-orientated,
Speak fluent Swedish, Norweigan, Danish or Finnish.
Communicate confidentially in English.
Are available for the full season (April/May - September/October)
Hold a valid B driver´s license, and it must be valid for a minimum of one full calendar year from your arrival at the destination.

Merits, but not required:

Experience in service, events, hotels, children activities, or tourism.

Personality and motivation are our top priorities.

What we offer

Internal training before season start.
Company provided accommodation free of charge and all reasonable accommodation costs are taken care by Nazar.
Flight tickets covered according to your terms outlines in your contract.
You will have a legal employment contract, valid insurance from Nordic´s, and official work permit (if/when required in destination country).
Monthly salary paid in Euro or Turkish lira. 
A workplace full of energy, teamwork, and development possibilities.
A culture where you are part of the Nazar family from day one..

About Nazar Nordic

Nazar is part of the TUI Group, the world´s largest travel company.
We have a great lineup of carefully selected hotels, each with its own special charm and concept.
We specialize in All Inclusive travels with over 20 years of experience.
We create unforgettable holiday experiences for Nordic guests.

Application

Does one of these positions sounds like your next challenge?

Send your application today - selection is ongoing!

Please indicate which position you are applying for: Service Guide or Combi Guide, and feel free to attach both your CV and cover letter.

We look forward to welcoming you for the summer of 2026 and an unforgetable experience at the destination!
